description:

- Corrected notation across the board
- Changed section names for better locating
- Updated guitar

title: Sugar

description:
Updates

- Changed section names for better locating
- Simplified tempo changes to keep it overall in line with the original track, but not muck up the screen with markers everywhere
- Corrected notation errors in drums, guitar, and bass
- Removed note names on everything; they are unnecessary on this tab and make things harder to read
- Changed instruments order
title: Sugar

description:
Song starts faster again!
Added back some details that were taken out like the little chords at bar 12 and 13, the Bass line change at the Interludes/Pre-Choruses at bars 11 and 37 and the big transition at bar 76, Guitar Slides during the Interludes and Verses are legato
Added some more Vocal details and quirks
Adjusted the Track orden more in order of appearence
Added back the Chord Names and Notes, they still help!
title: Sugar

description:
System of a Down - Sugar
Added Vocals
Changed BPM
Added Note Names and Chords
Edited Guitar Slides, added Let Rings and Chords during the Verse
Corrected the Bass's Verse riff (he plays it like that live) and added a detail before the Chorus
Edited the Drums to more closely match the album version, with more varied Cymbals, and corrected the Ride rhythm during the Verses
